mapper.sql: id, user_id, card_code, bill_time, rep_time, plan_begin, plan_end, amount, rese_amt, return_amt, plan_area, plan_city, parn_id, states, create_time, rout_id, sub_id, notyet_amt, order_no, return_times, ree_time, handling_fee

sql.where:
and card_code = #{cardCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}
order by create_time desc

update t_repay_plan
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
card_code = #{cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bill_time = #{billTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_repay_plan set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, card_code = #{cardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_time = #{billTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rep_time = #{repTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_begin = #{planBegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_end = #{planEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rese_amt = #{reseAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, return_amt = #{returnAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_area = #{planArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_city = #{planCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parn_id = #{parnId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, states = #{states,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rout_id = #{routId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_id = #{subId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update t_payment_detail set status = 1 where 1=1 and plan_id = #{planId}
update t_repay_plan set states = 1 where 1=1 and id = #{planId}
